description: When you open the MOPEKS application for the first time, a window will open asking if you want to make the MTXT file associated with the MOPEKS program, click Yes .
MTXT files are located in one of the class folders found in C:\​MOPEKS\​Library\​Problems User .
NOTE: Other MOPEKS associated files include .MPKT , .MSCT , and .MTHD .
